content: this lovely lace hat comes together in just a few hours made with rainbow 8/4 yarn and a 3 mm hook its airy lace lines gently spiral around the head finished with a soft scalloped edge that gives a light graceful feel it s perfect for cozying up indoors or stepping out and the subtle golden thread adds a little touch of warmth and elegance a single skein is all you need to make either size measurements head circumference 54-56 57-59 cm /21 3-22 3 22 4-23 2 depth 19 21 5 cm / 7 4 8 5 materials 1 skein of rainbow 8/4 glitter gold color 02 crochet hook 3 mm d-3 scissors tape measure
